products.title: 35-3/8 in. 8/10 TPI Compact Extreme Thick Metal Cutting Band Saw Blade (3-Pack) For M18 FUEL/Corded Compact Bandsaw
products.description: High-performance saw delivers fast, accurate cuts in a variety of materials. Powerful motor and optimized blade design provide smooth cutting performance. Lightweight and ergonomic design reduces user fatigue.
highlights: Powerful motor for demanding applications
57-degree bevel capacity with stops at 45 and 22.5 degrees
Integrated dust blower keeps line of cut clear
Magnesium shoe for lightweight durability

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does this come with a battery and charger?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This depends on the specific kit you purchase. The 'tool only' version does not include a battery or charger. The kit version includes both. Please check the product title for details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this compatible with my existing batteries?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, this tool is compatible with all batteries from the same voltage platform. For example, all 20V MAX batteries work with all 20V MAX tools from the same brand.
